abstract: Vatican sends official diplomatic note to Mexican ambassador insisting that Pope Francis meant no insult when he made comment linking Mexico to drug trafficking, offending Mexican government.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican on Wednesday sought to defuse a diplomatic quarrel with Mexico after Pope Francis referred to the possible “Mexicanization” of his native Argentina from drug trafficking.

headline.main: The Vatican: Pope’s Remark Irks Mexico
headline.print_headline: The Vatican: Pope’s Remark Irks Mexico

snippet: The Vatican on Wednesday sought to defuse a diplomatic quarrel with Mexico after Pope Francis referred to the possible “Mexicanization” of his native Argentina from drug trafficking.
